title: The Incomplete Mind is Made Perfect Through the Power of Narrative.
description: Reflections on @Paul VanderKlay  commentary on Oliver Sacks, Peterson,Pageau, Vervaeke, and McGilchrist. Compared to the story of Henry Darger
